AccountProductForecast.name: AccountProductForecast
AccountProductForecast.description: Represents the cumulative values for planned quantities, opportunities, and orders of a sales agreement for a given product across all periods in that rolling time period.

AccountForecastId.description: ID of the account forecast record which the account product is part of.

IsActive.description: Indicator of whether the product is active or not.

IsSystemGenerated.description: Indicator of whether the record was manually inserted or system-generated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was viewed.

TotalAdjustedForecastedQuantity.description: Total forecasted quantity after manual adjustments are made.

TotalAdjustedForecastedRevenue.description: Total forecasted revenue after manual adjustments are made.

TotalCurrentOrdersQuantity.description: Total quantity derived from orders in the current period.

TotalCurrentOrdersRevenue.description: Total revenue derived from orders in the current period.

TotalForecastedQuantity.description: Total forecasted quantity before manual adjustments are made.

TotalForecastedRevenue.description: Total forecasted revenue before a manual adjustment is made.

TotalOpportunityQuantity.description: Total quantity derived from opportunities in the current period.

TotalOpportunityRevenue.description: Total revenue derived from opportunities in the current period.

TotalPastOrdersQuantity.description: Total quantity derived from orders in the last forecast period.

TotalPastOrdersRevenue.description: Total revenue derived from orders in the last forecast period.

TotalSalesAgreementPlannedQuantity.description: Total planned quantity derived from sales agreements in the current period.

TotalSalesAgreementPlannedRevenue.description: Total planned revenue derived from sales agreements in the current period.
